title: Critical challenges and solutions: quasi-solid-state electrolytes for zinc-based batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00357H, Review Article
Haoyang Ge, Xian Xie, Xuesong Xie, Bingyao Zhang, Shenglong Li, Shuquan Liang, Bingan Lu, Jiang Zhou
QSSEs are emerging in aqueous ZBs and modern applications. By summarizing the fundamentals of materials properties, battery performance and applications of QSSEs, this review provides insight into the future development and optimization of ZBs in wider application fields.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
